pullRequest.title: Add blue print data providers to minecolonies
pullRequest.bodyText:
Changes proposed in this pull request:
Allows building and decoration TE's to hold special blueprint TE data
Fix tavern autohire
Fix raids not always obeying the min nights
Fix player login loading chunks during network login event
Improve guard experience gain
Review please

commit.message: Add blue print data providers to minecolonies

nodes.bodyText: Please put those over all the methods.

commit.message: Move fields ontop, fix possible building enter crash
